# identityReference

**Instance Property**

A persistent keychain reference to a keychain item containing the certificate and private key components of the tunneling protocol authentication credential.

## Declaration

```swift
var identityReference: Data? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The keychain item must have the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Security/kSecClassIdentity] class. In macOS, the system ignores this property for [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocolIPSec] objects. On iOS, the system ignores this property for [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocolIPSec] and [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocolIKEv2] objects. In these cases where the system ingores this property, set the identity using the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocol/identityData] property.

## Authenticating the user

- **username**: The user name component of the tunneling protocol authentication credential.
- **passwordReference**: A persistent keychain reference to a keychain item containing the password component of the tunneling protocol authentication credential.
- **identityData**: The certificate and private key components of the tunneling protocol authentication credential, in PKCS12 format.
- **identityDataPassword**: The password for the PKCS12 tunneling protocol authentication credentials.
